feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING ENDED, Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:40 a.m. NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 7:30 AM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: E 41 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 3 except 8 north of Cape Ray.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches developing this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 in the Wreckhouse area this morning. High plus 3 except 8 north of Cape Ray. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:45 AM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 2 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:45 AM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:45 AM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
